Name: Lust Colony
About the game: A couple weeks ago Sophie got expelled from university due to her bad grades, due to a stroke of luck she immediately got a job supervising the development of a resort colony. About a week after the interview Sophie was already traveling to her new job. Help Sophie develop this planet from a jungle to a luxury hotel and maybe have some fun with the rest of the crew.â€‹ Features Lust Colony is a visual novel with light management aspect to it Plot important scenes as well as sex scenes featuring the main character are dubbed 4 different endings 2 secret plots to find
